create_statement: CREATE TABLE categories (id UUID NOT NULL, nom TEXT NOT NULL, famille_id UUID NOT NULL, description TEXT, ordre_affichage INTEGER, is_active BOOLEAN, target_revenue NUMERIC(10,2), target_margin_percent NUMERIC(5,2), seasonality_factor NUMERIC(3,2), min_stock_days INTEGER, max_stock_days INTEGER, avg_delivery_days INTEGER, material_category TEXT, room_focus ARRAY, style_category TEXT, tags ARRAY, is_featured BOOLEAN, marketing_priority INTEGER, seo_title TEXT, seo_description TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE commande_client_lignes (id UUID NOT NULL, commande_id UUID NOT NULL, product_id UUID NOT NULL, quantite INTEGER NOT NULL, quantite_preparee INTEGER, quantite_expediee INTEGER, prix_unitaire_ht NUMERIC(10,2) NOT NULL, taux_tva NUMERIC(5,2), eco_participation_unitaire NUMERIC(8,2), montant_ht NUMERIC(10,2), montant_tva NUMERIC(10,2), montant_eco NUMERIC(10,2), montant_ttc NUMERIC(10,2), statut_ligne TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE commande_fournisseur_lignes (id UUID NOT NULL, commande_id UUID NOT NULL, product_id UUID NOT NULL, quantite_commandee INTEGER NOT NULL, quantite_confirmee INTEGER, quantite_recue INTEGER, quantite_conforme INTEGER, quantite_restante INTEGER, statut TEXT, prix_unitaire_achat_ht NUMERIC(10,2) NOT NULL, remise_percent NUMERIC(5,2), prix_unitaire_achat_net NUMERIC(10,2), taux_tva NUMERIC(5,2) NOT NULL, eco_participation_unitaire NUMERIC(8,2), taxe_deee_unitaire NUMERIC(8,2), taxe_emballage_unitaire NUMERIC(8,2), autres_taxes_unitaires NUMERIC(8,2), montant_achat_ht NUMERIC(10,2), montant_achat_tva NUMERIC(10,2), montant_achat_eco_participation NUMERIC(10,2), montant_achat_taxes_unitaires NUMERIC(10,2), montant_achat_ttc NUMERIC(10,2), prix_unitaire_vente_ht NUMERIC(10,2), taux_tva_vente NUMERIC(5,2), montant_vente_ht NUMERIC(10,2), montant_vente_ttc NUMERIC(10,2), marge_unitaire_ht NUMERIC(10,2), marge_totale_ht NUMERIC(10,2), prix_revient_unitaire_ht NUMERIC(10,2), prix_revient_unitaire_ttc NUMERIC(10,2), part_frais_livraison NUMERIC(10,2), part_taxes_globales NUMERIC(10,2), ligne_remplacee_id UUID, motif_remplacement TEXT, date_reception_prevue DATE, date_reception_reelle TIMESTAMPTZ, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE commande_relances (id UUID NOT NULL, commande_id UUID NOT NULL, type_relance TEXT NOT NULL, date_relance TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, canal TEXT NOT NULL, destinataire_nom TEXT, destinataire_email TEXT, destinataire_telephone TEXT, objet TEXT NOT NULL, message TEXT NOT NULL, pieces_jointes JSONB, reponse_recue BOOLEAN, date_reponse TIMESTAMPTZ, contenu_reponse TEXT, created_by UUID NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE commandes_client (id UUID NOT NULL, numero_commande TEXT NOT NULL, client_id UUID NOT NULL, validateur_id UUID, statut TEXT NOT NULL, canal_commande TEXT NOT NULL, date_commande TIMESTAMPTZ, date_validation TIMESTAMPTZ, date_livraison_souhaitee DATE, date_livraison_prevue DATE, date_expedition TIMESTAMPTZ, date_livraison_reelle TIMESTAMPTZ, nb_lignes INTEGER, quantite_totale INTEGER, total_ht NUMERIC(12,2), total_tva NUMERIC(12,2), total_eco_participation NUMERIC(12,2), frais_livraison NUMERIC(10,2), total_ttc NUMERIC(12,2), adresse_facturation JSONB NOT NULL, adresse_livraison JSONB, commentaire_client TEXT, notes_internes TEXT, transporteur TEXT, numero_suivi TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE commandes_client_en_cours (id UUID, numero_commande TEXT, client_id UUID, validateur_id UUID, statut TEXT, canal_commande TEXT, date_commande TIMESTAMPTZ, date_validation TIMESTAMPTZ, date_livraison_souhaitee DATE, date_livraison_prevue DATE, date_expedition TIMESTAMPTZ, date_livraison_reelle TIMESTAMPTZ, nb_lignes INTEGER, quantite_totale INTEGER, total_ht NUMERIC(12,2), total_tva NUMERIC(12,2), total_eco_participation NUMERIC(12,2), frais_livraison NUMERIC(10,2), total_ttc NUMERIC(12,2), adresse_facturation JSONB, adresse_livraison JSONB, commentaire_client TEXT, notes_internes TEXT, transporteur TEXT, numero_suivi TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ, client_nom TEXT, client_type TEXT, client_email TEXT, urgence_livraison TEXT, progression_percent INTEGER);

CREATE TABLE commandes_fournisseur (id UUID NOT NULL, numero_commande TEXT NOT NULL, fournisseur_id UUID, commandeur_id UUID NOT NULL, validateur_id UUID, statut TEXT NOT NULL, date_commande TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, date_validation TIMESTAMPTZ, date_confirmation_fournisseur TIMESTAMPTZ, date_expedition_prevue DATE, date_livraison_prevue DATE, date_livraison_souhaitee DATE, date_reception_complete TIMESTAMPTZ, conditions_paiement TEXT, mode_livraison TEXT, devise TEXT NOT NULL, taux_change NUMERIC(10,6), adresse_livraison JSONB, entrepot_destination TEXT NOT NULL, transporteur_prefere TEXT, instructions_livraison TEXT, frais_livraison NUMERIC(10,2), methode_repartition_livraison TEXT, taxes_globales NUMERIC(10,2), methode_repartition_taxes TEXT, nb_lignes INTEGER, nb_references INTEGER, quantite_totale_elements INTEGER, densite_commande NUMERIC(8,2), total_achat_ht NUMERIC(12,2), total_tva NUMERIC(12,2), total_eco_participation NUMERIC(12,2), total_taxes_unitaires NUMERIC(12,2), total_achat_ttc NUMERIC(12,2), total_vente_theorique_ht NUMERIC(12,2), total_vente_theorique_ttc NUMERIC(12,2), progression_reception_percent NUMERIC(5,2), progression_references_percent NUMERIC(5,2), commentaires_internes TEXT, commentaires_fournisseur TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE contacts_avec_partenaire (id UUID, partenaire_id UUID, type_partenaire TEXT, partenaire_nom TEXT, contact_nom TEXT, fonction TEXT, service TEXT, est_contact_principal BOOLEAN, email_pro TEXT, telephone_direct TEXT, telephone_mobile TEXT, domaine_competence ARRAY, langues ARRAY, disponibilite TEXT, derniere_interaction TIMESTAMPTZ, is_active BOOLEAN, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE contacts_partenaires (id UUID NOT NULL, partenaire_id UUID NOT NULL, prenom TEXT NOT NULL, nom TEXT NOT NULL, civilite TEXT, fonction TEXT, service TEXT, est_contact_principal BOOLEAN NOT NULL, email_pro TEXT, telephone_direct TEXT, telephone_mobile TEXT, domaine_competence ARRAY, langues ARRAY, disponibilite TEXT, timezone TEXT, notes TEXT, derniere_interaction TIMESTAMPTZ, is_active BOOLEAN NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, nom_complet TEXT);
CREATE TABLE contacts_principaux (partenaire_id UUID, type_partenaire TEXT, partenaire_nom TEXT, contact_principal_nom TEXT, contact_principal_email TEXT, telephone_direct TEXT, fonction TEXT);

CREATE TABLE entity_urls (id UUID NOT NULL, entity_type TEXT NOT NULL, entity_id UUID NOT NULL, type_url TEXT NOT NULL, url TEXT NOT NULL, libelle_bouton TEXT, description TEXT, is_active BOOLEAN, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE familles (id UUID NOT NULL, nom TEXT NOT NULL, description TEXT, ordre_affichage INTEGER, is_active BOOLEAN, target_revenue NUMERIC(10,2), commission_rate NUMERIC(5,2), launch_date DATE, lifecycle_stage TEXT, price_range TEXT, primary_channel TEXT, tags ARRAY, seo_title TEXT, seo_description TEXT, marketing_priority INTEGER, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE lignes_commande_detail (id UUID, commande_id UUID, product_id UUID, quantite INTEGER, quantite_preparee INTEGER, quantite_expediee INTEGER, prix_unitaire_ht NUMERIC(10,2), taux_tva NUMERIC(5,2), eco_participation_unitaire NUMERIC(8,2), montant_ht NUMERIC(10,2), montant_tva NUMERIC(10,2), montant_eco NUMERIC(10,2), montant_ttc NUMERIC(10,2), statut_ligne TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ, numero_commande TEXT, commande_statut TEXT, produit_nom TEXT, produit_ref TEXT, progression_expedition NUMERIC(,));
CREATE TABLE logs_stock (id UUID NOT NULL, action TEXT NOT NULL, details JSONB, created_by UUID, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE mouvements_stock (id UUID NOT NULL, product_id UUID NOT NULL, warehouse_id UUID, mouvement_type TEXT NOT NULL, quantite INTEGER NOT NULL, quantite_effective INTEGER NOT NULL, source_table TEXT, ref_source_id UUID, cout_unitaire_ht NUMERIC(10,2), commentaire TEXT, created_by UUID, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE partenaires (id UUID NOT NULL, type_partenaire TEXT NOT NULL, prenom TEXT, nom TEXT, sexe TEXT, denomination_sociale TEXT, nom_commercial TEXT, siret VARCHAR(14), email TEXT, telephone TEXT, website_url TEXT, billing_address_line1 TEXT NOT NULL, billing_address_line2 TEXT, billing_city TEXT NOT NULL, billing_postal_code TEXT NOT NULL, billing_country CHARACTER NOT NULL, has_diff_shipping_addr BOOLEAN NOT NULL, shipping_address_line1 TEXT, shipping_address_line2 TEXT, shipping_city TEXT, shipping_postal_code TEXT, shipping_country CHARACTER, canal_acquisition TEXT, commentaires TEXT, specialites ARRAY, segment_industrie TEXT, conditions_paiement TEXT, taux_tva NUMERIC(5,2), langue CHARACTER NOT NULL, timezone TEXT NOT NULL, is_active BOOLEAN NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, nom_complet TEXT);

CREATE TABLE partenaires_liste (id UUID, type_partenaire TEXT, nom_complet TEXT, email TEXT, telephone TEXT, website_url TEXT, ville_principale TEXT, specialites ARRAY, segment_industrie TEXT, canal_acquisition TEXT, conditions_paiement TEXT, is_active BOOLEAN, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE product_groups (id UUID NOT NULL, nom TEXT NOT NULL, sous_categorie_id UUID NOT NULL, fournisseur_id UUID, dimensions TEXT, poids_kg NUMERIC(8,2), description_groupe TEXT, is_active BOOLEAN, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ);
CREATE TABLE product_images (id UUID NOT NULL, product_id UUID NOT NULL, url TEXT NOT NULL, ordre INTEGER, legende TEXT, type_image TEXT, is_principale BOOLEAN, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ);
CREATE TABLE product_urls (product_id UUID, type_url TEXT, url TEXT, libelle_bouton TEXT, description TEXT);

CREATE TABLE products (id UUID NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, is_active BOOLEAN NOT NULL, nom TEXT NOT NULL, ref_interne TEXT, ref_fournisseur TEXT, type_article TEXT NOT NULL, unite TEXT, statut TEXT NOT NULL, validation_sourcing TEXT, validation_echantillon TEXT, fin_de_serie BOOLEAN NOT NULL, sous_categorie_id UUID NOT NULL, product_group_id UUID, couleurs ARRAY, matieres ARRAY, pieces_habitation ARRAY, dimensions TEXT, poids_kg NUMERIC(8,2), tva_fournisseur NUMERIC(5,2), prix_achat_ht_indicatif NUMERIC(10,2), marge_percent NUMERIC(5,2), prix_minimum_ht NUMERIC(10,2), prix_minimum_ttc NUMERIC(10,2), seuil_alerte INTEGER, moq INTEGER, description_fournisseur TEXT, description_whatsapp TEXT, description_site_internet TEXT, description_leboncoin TEXT, titre_seo TEXT, description_seo TEXT, fournisseur_id UUID, variantes INTEGER, univers TEXT, nom_complet TEXT);

CREATE TABLE products_enrichie (id UUID, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ, is_active BOOLEAN, nom TEXT, ref_interne TEXT, ref_fournisseur TEXT, type_article TEXT, unite TEXT, statut TEXT, validation_sourcing TEXT, validation_echantillon TEXT, fin_de_serie BOOLEAN, sous_categorie_id UUID, product_group_id UUID, couleurs ARRAY, matieres ARRAY, pieces_habitation ARRAY, dimensions TEXT, poids_kg NUMERIC(8,2), tva_fournisseur NUMERIC(5,2), prix_achat_ht_indicatif NUMERIC(10,2), marge_percent NUMERIC(5,2), prix_minimum_ht NUMERIC(10,2), prix_minimum_ttc NUMERIC(10,2), seuil_alerte INTEGER, moq INTEGER, description_fournisseur TEXT, description_whatsapp TEXT, description_site_internet TEXT, description_leboncoin TEXT, titre_seo TEXT, description_seo TEXT, fournisseur_id UUID, variantes INTEGER, univers TEXT, nom_complet TEXT, sous_categorie_nom TEXT, categorie_nom TEXT, famille_nom TEXT, groupe_nom TEXT, description_groupe TEXT, fournisseur_nom TEXT, fournisseur_email TEXT, nb_images BIGINT, image_principale_url TEXT);

CREATE TABLE promotions (id UUID NOT NULL, code_promo TEXT, nom TEXT NOT NULL, description TEXT, client_id UUID, canal_vente TEXT, produit_id UUID, type_promotion TEXT NOT NULL, valeur NUMERIC(10,2), quantite_min INTEGER, quantite_max INTEGER, montant_min NUMERIC(10,2), montant_max NUMERIC(10,2), date_debut DATE NOT NULL, date_fin DATE, quota_activations INTEGER, quota_par_client INTEGER, actif BOOLEAN, priorite INTEGER, commentaire TEXT, created_by UUID, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE promotions_historique (id UUID NOT NULL, promotion_id UUID NOT NULL, code_promo TEXT, nom TEXT, description TEXT, client_id UUID, canal_vente TEXT, produit_id UUID, type_promotion TEXT, valeur NUMERIC(10,2), quantite_min INTEGER, quantite_max INTEGER, montant_min NUMERIC(10,2), montant_max NUMERIC(10,2), date_debut DATE, date_fin DATE, quota_activations INTEGER, quota_par_client INTEGER, actif BOOLEAN, priorite INTEGER, commentaire TEXT, modif_type TEXT NOT NULL, modif_par UUID, modif_at TIMESTAMPTZ);
CREATE TABLE promotions_usages (id UUID NOT NULL, promotion_id UUID NOT NULL, client_id UUID, commande_id UUID, usage_date TIMESTAMPTZ, montant_remise NUMERIC(10,2), created_by UUID);

CREATE TABLE sous_categories (id UUID NOT NULL, nom TEXT NOT NULL, categorie_id UUID NOT NULL, description TEXT, ordre_affichage INTEGER, is_active BOOLEAN, target_revenue NUMERIC(10,2), conversion_rate_target NUMERIC(5,2), avg_unit_cost NUMERIC(10,2), avg_selling_price NUMERIC(10,2), standard_margin_percent NUMERIC(5,2), size_category TEXT, complexity_level TEXT, customization_available BOOLEAN, reorder_threshold INTEGER, reorder_quantity INTEGER, storage_requirements TEXT, tags ARRAY, is_bestseller BOOLEAN, is_seasonal BOOLEAN, season_peak_months ARRAY, page_views_target INTEGER, search_keywords ARRAY, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE stock_alertes (product_id UUID, produit_nom TEXT, produit_ref TEXT, warehouse_id UUID, qoh BIGINT, seuil_alerte INTEGER, status_stock TEXT, cout_moyen_unitaire NUMERIC(,), priorite INTEGER, derniere_maj TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE stock_courant (product_id UUID, produit_nom TEXT, produit_ref TEXT, warehouse_id UUID, qoh BIGINT, seuil_alerte INTEGER, status_stock TEXT, cout_moyen_unitaire NUMERIC(,), derniere_maj TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE tarifs_actifs_enrichis (id UUID, client_id UUID, client_nom TEXT, produit_id UUID, produit_nom TEXT, produit_ref TEXT, canal_vente TEXT, quantite_min INTEGER, quantite_max INTEGER, prix_ht NUMERIC(10,2), devise TEXT, type_tarif TEXT, priorite INTEGER, date_debut DATE, date_fin DATE, statut_validite TEXT, commentaire TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE tarifs_clients_quantites (id UUID NOT NULL, client_id UUID, produit_id UUID NOT NULL, canal_vente TEXT, quantite_min INTEGER NOT NULL, quantite_max INTEGER, prix_ht NUMERIC(10,2) NOT NULL, devise TEXT, type_tarif TEXT, actif BOOLEAN, priorite INTEGER, commentaire TEXT, date_debut DATE, date_fin DATE, created_by UUID, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE tarifs_clients_quantites_historique (id UUID NOT NULL, tarif_id UUID NOT NULL, client_id UUID, produit_id UUID, canal_vente TEXT, quantite_min INTEGER, quantite_max INTEGER, prix_ht NUMERIC(10,2), devise TEXT, type_tarif TEXT, actif BOOLEAN, priorite INTEGER, commentaire TEXT, date_debut DATE, date_fin DATE, modif_type TEXT NOT NULL, modif_par UUID, modif_at TIMESTAMPTZ);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (id UUID NOT NULL, first_name TEXT, last_name TEXT, company_name TEXT, phone TEXT, language CHARACTER, currency CHARACTER, timezone TEXT, customer_type TEXT NOT NULL, preferred_contact TEXT NOT NULL, marketing_consent BOOLEAN, street_address TEXT, city TEXT, postal_code TEXT, country CHARACTER, profile_completed BOOLEAN, onboarding_completed_at TIMESTAMPTZ, notes TEXT, tags ARRAY, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ);
CREATE TABLE utilisateurs (id UUID NOT NULL, email TEXT NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ);
CREATE TABLE warehouses (id UUID NOT NULL, nom TEXT NOT NULL, code TEXT NOT NULL, adresse TEXT, is_active BOOLEAN, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ);
